United States Court of Appeals
                    For the First Circuit
                     ____________________
No. 01-2413


                  UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,
                          Appellee,

                              v.

                       SANJAY SACHDEV,
                    Defendant, Appellant.


                     ____________________


                        ERRATA SHEET

     The opinion of this court, issued February 1, 2002,
should be amended as follows:

p 6, l. 22, delete "5K1.12" and replace with "5K2.12".
